text: 4.2 1 Ko 1.18, 2 Ko 2.17, 6.4, 6.7, 1 Te 2.3-5 Chɨn pen we gɨl gɨpal adek ak sek, nebeŋ gaknɨŋ gɨpal adek ak sek pɨsnep kelɨgɨpun. Tɨtay gɨpun okok yepɨs adek ak ma gɨpun. God takaw agñɨnɨg, takaw chɨn ke ogɨnap sek agun agɨl ma apun. Binɨb okok chɨnop nɨŋɨd, yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl gon ameb ak nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, God chɨnop nɨg mɨdaknɨŋ, takaw ne yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl ak mɨseŋ agñɨbun.
